name: Aggressive
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective per-round damage output by 2.
traitDescription: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

name: Ambusher
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective attack bonus by 1.
traitDescription: In the first round of a combat, the doppelganger has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised.

name: Amorphous
traitDescription: The pudding can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

name: Amphibious
traitDescription: The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

name: Angelic Weapons
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective per-round damage by the amount noted in the trait.
traitDescription: The deva's weapon attacks are magical. When the deva hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 4d8 radiant damage.

name: Antimagic Susceptibility
traitDescription: The sword is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the sword must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

name: Avoidance
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective AC by 1.
traitDescription: If the demilich is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

name: Blind Senses
traitDescription: The grimlock can't use its blindsight while deafened and unable to smell.

name: Blood Frenzy
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective attack bonus by 4.
traitDescription: The sahuagin has advantage on melee attacks against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

name: Breath Weapon
crEffect: For the purpose of determining effective damage output, assume the breath weapon hits two targets, and that each target fails its saving throw.
traitDescription: Action (Recharge 5-6). The dragon exhales acid in a 90-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw, taking 67 (15d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

name: Brute
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective per-round damage by the amount noted in the trait.
traitDescription: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the bugbear hits with it.

name: Chameleon Skin
traitDescription: The troglodyte has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

name: Change Shape
traitDescription: Action. The dragon magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating no higher than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the dragon's choice). In a new form, the dragon retains its alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Legendary Resistance, lair actions, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action. Its statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except any class features or legendary actions of that form.

name: Charge
crEffect: Increase the monster's damage on one attack by the amount noted in the trait.
traitDescription: If the centaur moves at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a pike attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) piercing damage.

name: Charm
traitDescription: Action. The vampire targets one humanoid it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the vampire, the target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or be charmed by the vampire. The charmed target regards the vampire as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. Although the target isn't under the vampire's control, it takes the vampire's requests or actions in the most favorable way it can, and is a willing target for the vampire's bite attack. Each time the vampire or the vampire's companions do anything harmful to the target, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours or until the vampire is destroyed, is on a different plane of existence than the target, or takes a bonus action to end the effect.

name: Constrict
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective AC by 1.
traitDescription: Action. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the creature is restrained, and the snake can't constrict another target.

name: Damage Absorption
traitDescription: Lightning Absorption. Whenever the golem is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

name: Damage Transfer
crEffect: Double the monster's effective hit points. Add one-third of the monster's hit points to its per-round damage.
traitDescription: While attached to a creature, the cloaker takes only half the damage dealt to it (rounded down), and that creature takes the other half.

name: Death Burst
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective damage output for 1 round by the amount noted in the trait, and assume it affects two creatures.
traitDescription: When the magmin dies, it explodes in a burst of fire and magma. Each creature within 10 feet of it must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Flammable objects that aren't being worn or carried in that area are ignited.

name: Devil Sight
traitDescription: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

name: Dive
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective damage on one attack by the amount noted in the trait.
traitDescription: Dive Attack. If the aarakocra is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 3 (1d6) damage to the target.

name: Echolocation
traitDescription: The hook horror can't use its blindsight while deafened.

name: Elemental Body
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective per-round damage by the amount noted in the trait.

name: Enlarge
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective per-round damage by the amount noted in the trait.

name: Fiendish Blessing
crEffect: Apply the monster's Charisma modifier to its actual AC.

name: Frightful Presence
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective hit points by 25% if the monster is meant to face characters of 10th level or lower. Almost identical to Horrifying Visage. (range 120ft instead of 60ft)

name: Horrifying Visage
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective hit points by 25% if the monster is meant to face characters of 10th level or lower. Almost identical to Frightful Presence. (range 60ft instead of 120ft)

name: Innate Spellcasting
crEffect: See step 13 under "Creating a Monster Stat Block."

name: Legendary Resistance
crEffect: Each per-day use of this trait increases the monster's effective hit points based on the expected challenge rating: 1-4, 10 hp; 5-10, 20 hp; 11 or higher, 30 hp.

name: Magic Resistance
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective AC by 2.

name: Martial Advantage
crEffect: Increase the effective damage of one attack per round by the amount gained from this trait.

name: Nimble Escape
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective AC and effective attack bonus by 4 (assuming the monster hides every round)

name: Pack Tactics
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective attack bonus by 1.

name: Parry
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective AC by 1.

name: Possession
crEffect: Double the monster's effective hit points.

name: Pounce
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective damage for 1 round by the amount it deals with the bonus action gained from this trait.

name: Psychic Defense
crEffect: Apply the monster's Wisdom modifier to its actual AC if the monster isn't wearing armor or wielding a shield.

name: Rampage
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective per-round damage by 2.

name: Regeneration
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective hit points by 3 x the number of hit points the monster regenerates each round.

name: Relentless
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective hit points based on the expected challenge rating: 1-4, 7 hp; 5-10, 14 hp; 11-16, 21 hp; 17 or higher, 28 hp.

name: Shadow Stealth
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective AC by 4.

name: Spellcasting
crEffect: See step 13 under "Creating a Monster Stat Block."

name: Stench
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective AC by 1.

name: Superior Invisibility
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective AC by 2.

name: Surprise Attack
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective damage for 1 round by the amount noted in the trait.

name: Swallow
crEffect: Assume the monster swallows one creature and deals 2 rounds of acid damage to it.

name: Undead Fortitude
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective hit points based on the expected challenge rating: 1-4, 7 hp; 5-10, 14hp; 11-16, 21 hp; 17 or higher, 28 hp.

name: Web
crEffect: Increase the monster's effective AC by 1.

name: Wounded Fury
crEffect: Increase the monster's damage for 1 round by the amount noted in the trait.
